annotations.title: Dornish Sour | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Mandarin Juice
2 dashes Angostura Bitters
1 Barspoon Fernet Branca
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Pisco
3 oz. -or- 90 ml. Ruby Port

Shake over ice and open pour
garnish with mint and fruit

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oouggsORdz8
title: Dornish Sour
